content.body: I do not think my understanding of the meaning of “initialization” matches in that case, but this is an area I haven’t read 262 closely enough to speak with confidence. I interpret “link” to mean “establish connections between the module lexical scopes of a module graph such that corresponding imported and exported values refer to the same memory”. I interpret “initialize” to mean “assign initial values into the module lexical scope for hoisted imports and exports like function declarations”. I interpret “evaluate” to be the subsequent execution of the module, which is synchronous up to the first await. I’m foggy on top-level-await behavior beyond that.

content.body: Please correct me where my terms don’t match the shared vernacular as writ.
